ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 52
ygData.msgSnippet: I work now for a company which does product development for government and Civilian customers.  This is also not the first company like this I have worked for.
ygData.messageBody:
I work now for a company which does product development for government
and Civilian customers. This is also not the first company like this I
have worked for. It is in the Aerospace field. I often bid jobs and
work up what the overall price will be to do a certain job. Believe me
when I say failures and scrap are included in the price. Now I do
estimate a certain percentage of scrap in the final price. That means
that any failures or waste over that I have to eat. GM, Boeing,
Gateway, and every other company operates the same way. t is how you
make profit.

Solomon
